com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.element

Class SeleniumWMultiDropdownWebElement

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.element.SeleniumWComponentWebElement
      • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.element.SeleniumGroupInputWebElement
        • com.github.bordertech.wcomponents.test.selenium.element.SeleniumWMultiDropdownWebElement
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.openqa.selenium.SearchContext, org.openqa.selenium.TakesScreenshot, org.openqa.selenium.WebElement

    public class SeleniumWMultiDropdownWebElement
extends SeleniumGroupInputWebElement
    WebElement to facilitate tests of WMultiDropdown.
    Since:
    1.4.0
    Author:
    Mark Reeves

      • getDropdowns

        public List<org.openqa.selenium.WebElement> getDropdowns()
        Gets the dropdowns in the WMultiDropdown. There will be one per selected option.
        Returns:
        the selection dropdowns in the WMultiDropdown.

      • isSelected

        public boolean isSelected(String labelText)
        Is an option with given text selected?
        Parameters:
        labelText - the text visible in the option to be tested
        Returns:
        true if an option with that text is in the selected dropdown.

      • deselect

        public void deselect(String optionText)
        Deselect the option with given text.
        Parameters:
        optionText - the text of the option to deselect

      • select

        public void select(String optionText)
        Select an option using its visible text.
        Parameters:

      • switchFirstOption

        public void switchFirstOption(String toText)
        Set a new selection in the first dropdown in a WMultiDropdown using visible option text. Convenient for setting a single selection.
        Parameters:
        toText - the visible text of the option to select

      • switchOption

        public void switchOption(String fromText,
                String toText)
        Change a selected option from one value to another.
        Parameters:
        fromText - the current selected text
        toText - the text to select

      • deselectAll

        public void deselectAll()
        Deselect "all" options. A slight misnomer as the first dropdown will end up with its the first option selected.
